Colophon

I'm a voracious researcher, designer, maker, hacker, hustler, advisor. I'm a founder and designer at Great Job and the designer in residence at Fort Work. I'm rather nomadic and split my time between a few of my favorite cities.

My Flow

If you've stumbled here looking for pretty pictures and wire frames and customer journey maps relating to what I've made in the past, find another designer. Aesthetically driven designers tend to congregate here, here, and here. That is not UX design. I solve complex and sophisticated problems which result in elegant solutions. Aesthetics is just the tip of the iceberg.

The Logo

Research, Design, Code, repeat.

My Work

The future defines me, not the past. While I've worked on a plethora of really cool projects, my best work is yet to come. If you want to be part of something radical, let's talk.

This Site

  • Built on Jekyll
  • Designed and coded in CSS, HTML, and Javascript with Sublime Text
  • Typographically powered by Google Fonts and Font Awesome
  • Subtle animation goodness enabled by StellarJS
  • Cover photos generated with Delaunay Triangles
  • Hosted for free on GitHub Pages

The Inspiration

A special thanks to aaronsw, caporez, mdo, and fat for all of the amazing work and proving me with inspiration and a rock solid jumping off point.

Cheers,

Geoffrey
